fixes.name: Percentage
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the Tableau calculated field Percentage ([Ratio] / 0.543) to a row-level DAX calculated column. Row-level arithmetic becomes a calculated column in Power BI and the [Ratio] reference was converted to 'Sheet1 (radial_bar_chart_data)'[Ratio].

fixes.name: wc_percentage
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR result = MAXX(
    ALLSELECTED('Sheet1 (radial_bar_chart_data)'),
    'Sheet1 (radial_bar_chart_data)'[Percentage]
)
RETURN
result
fixes.solution_explanation: Tableau's WINDOW_MAX(MAX([Percentage])) is a table calculation and requires a measure in DAX. Mapped the window maximum to MAXX over ALLSELECTED to emulate the window/partition context and referenced the dependent Percentage calculated column ('Sheet1 (radial_bar_chart_data)'[Percentage]).
